short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the New Tab background with a custom image, adds a clock and a search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Experience the serene beauty of a winter wonderland every time you open a new tab. This elegant theme features a pristine snowy landscape as the background, bringing a touch of tranquility to your browsing experience. The new tab includes a stylish, slightly transparent search bar for easy access to your queries, along with a digital clock to keep track of time. Additionally, you'll find customizable shortcuts for your favorite websites, all presented with clear icons and a minimalistic design to keep things clean and organized. Enjoy a peaceful and efficient browsing session with this winter-themed new tab page.
